history.narrative: Law 1-11, the “King Birthday Act of 1975,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-2, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 15, 1975 and April 29, 1975, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 28, 1975, it was assigned Act No. 1-16 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
